page.title: 12Nether Stowey: Churches
page.content: Within this area there are three Anglican churches, under the Diocese of Bath and Wells. The Church of St. Paul and St. Peter in the village of Over Stowey, and that of St. Mary's Nether Stowey are both under the ministry of Rev.R.Parker of Nether Stowey. The churches are active and hold functions and house groups. There is a choir, and children can attend Crusader Classes at the Vicarage. The Vicar takes a keen interest in the welfare of the Primary School , and is Chairman of the Governors. Each Friday he conducts a service of worship in school, and occasionally the whole school attends a service in the church. There is also an Anglican church at Dodington, in Holford parish, which is only used intermittently.The Vicar is Rev. Hancock.
